message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it offers a lot of value and would be a great purchase for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation. I am willing to pay $150 for the product.
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $150 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $165? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $155 for the product.
